name: Mind technologies SAS
goal:
Mind Technologies is an integrator specializing in network & telecommunications engineering and IT consulting. The goal of Mind Technologies is to ensure the most comprehensive convergence possible in the sectors of IT data exchange, networks, security, development and programming. Mind Technologies' engineers are multi-skilled. Unlike other companies where each person specializes in a specific area, our engineers have a training background and experience in several areas related to IT.
Our teams have a global view of the Information Systems chain, which allows them to provide relevant consulting and transversal diagnostics.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Foreign affairs and security policy, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
1- DIRECTIVE (EU) 2016/1148 OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 6 July 2016 concerning measures for a high common level of security of network and information systems across the Union

2- Call for applications for the selection of Members of The Stakeholder Cybersecurity Certification Group (SCCG)
